text: Yabonani uIbrâhîmwathi:“Nkosiyamkhawundiboniseindlela Ovusa ngayo abafileyo”. Wathi (uAllâh): “Ingaba awukholwa na?” Wathi yena: “Ewe (ndiyakholwa) kodwa ndifuna ukuba ndomelele elukholweni”. Wathi Yena: “Thabatha iintaka zibe ne, uzibizele kuwe (uze uzixhele, uzinqunqe zibe zizicwibi) wakugqiba ubeke izicwibi zazo kwiinduli zonke, wakugqiba uzibize, ziya kuza kuwe zingxamile, uya kwazi ke wena okokuba uAllâh nguSomandla, uSobulumko
